item.title: Connecting to Oracle database in Ubuntu with cx_Oracle
item.author: juliana.spector@water.ca.gov (Juliana Spector)
item.description: Migrating to Linux Iâ€™ve recently had a lot of issues with software compatibility in Windows OS and decided to take the plunge into setting up Linux with Ubuntu to do bulk of my data science work processes. Because most data I use day-to-day is stored in an Oracle database, it was necessary to figure out how to connect to database within a Linux environment. I set up a Linux virtual machine with 64-bit Ubuntu in Oracle VM Virtual Box Manager to get started.
